name: Kaeto Colony
description:
The frontier is there for you and your colonists, a place in the wild to plant your flag and build your home. Guide your kaetos, find them food, water, and homes here in this land of opportunity.

But heed the old stories, and remember your cradle tales. They say giants roam these untamed lands, and that they do not think kindly of intruders . Touch not the ruins of the old gods or their ancient relics and tools. Do not offend these deities and fear the trod of their feet.   

Kaeto Colony is a free menu-based colony building game with a relaxing atmosphere. 

Art and programming by the SpokenOlive

Music and sounds by Immortal Pigeon
